name: mushrun (itch)
description:
"mushrun" was created as a project for 
an exam of the Mobile Computing course of
Computer Engineering at Roma Tre University.
For a first project on Unity, our two-person team ended up
pretty satisfied of the outcome, so we felt confident enough
to put it out on itch.io, as a form of portofolio, but also to
share it with other people who may be interested in playing
something cute and mindless while letting time go by.
Made by:
Anton Clarenz Mendoza & Maria Luisa Marsella
